text: Robert Carlyle (born 14 April 1961) is a Scottish actor. His movie work includes Trainspotting (1996), The Full Monty (1997), The World Is Not Enough (1999), Angela's Ashes (1999), The 51st State (2001) and T2 Trainspotting (2017). He television credits include Hamish Macbeth, Stargate Universe, Human Trafficking and Once Upon a Time. He won the BAFTA Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role for The Full Monty and a Gemini Award for Stargate Universe. Carlyle was born in Maryhill, Glasgow. He has been married to Anastasia Shirley since 1997. The couple have three children. He is a supporter of Rangers Football Club. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glasgow Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors
title: Robert Carlyle
